jobDescription: Want to unlock insights from data to help doctors and nurses?Apply to be on our data science team!Have you ever found yourself or a loved one waiting hours and hours in a hospital Emergency Room to get care? Did you ever feel there weren't enough nurses to take care of all the patients in your area of the hospital? Or have you ever had a surgery scheduled for months in the future that needed to happen sooner? Unfortunately our healthcare system is full of these types of operational problems. Qventus is looking for an inspirational, operationally excellent, driven engineering leader who can help drive our data strategy and implementation. Our work saves lives and helps hospitals cut tens of millions of dollars in operational costs, while improving the quality of care they’re able to deliver.What we're looking for in a leader
